pages.title: How to drink water?
pages.text: Just sneak + right click on a water source to drink.$(br2)$(l)River Biomes$() are the best option to drink raw water.

pages.title: Collect Rain Water
pages.text: You can collect rain water with the copper cauldron.$(br2)It takes some time, but you get fresh & save water out of that.

pages.title: Purified Bottles
pages.text: You can place Bottle's of Water on a Campfire to boil them.$(br2)You will recieve Purified Water Bottles.

pages.title: Purified Buckets
pages.text: Smelt a Water Bucket in a Furnace to receive Purified Water Bucket.

pages.title: Boil Water
pages.text: Place a Campfire Cauldron over a campfire and fill it with water.$(br2)It takes 100 t / 5 sec.
The pump allows you to place Water Buckets or Bottles.$(br2)It has a timer of 1200 t / 1 min.

pages.title: Water To-Go
pages.text: Different Flasks allow you to carry fresh water with you.$(br2)All different flasks are listed in the upcoming pages.

pages.title: More Infos ?
pages.text: Check out the Dehydration Handbook for more infos.
